snippet: Witnesses said a bomb carried by a girl who appeared no older than 10 had killed at least 20 people in a northern Nigeria market.
abstract: Child suicide bomber kills more than 20 people in Nigeria; scores more are injured, 18 critically.

byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Witnesses said a bomb carried by a girl who appeared no older than 10 had killed at least 20 people in a northern Nigeria market.

headline.main: In Nigeria, New Boko Haram Suicide Bomber Tactic: ‘It’s a Little Girl’
